Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Famously \Fa"mous*ly\, adv. In a famous manner; in a distinguished degree; greatly; splendidly. [1913 Webster]
Then this land was famously enriched With politic grave counsel. --Shak. [1913 Webster]

famously adv 1: in a manner or to an extent that is well known; "in his famously anecdotal style" 2: in a splendid manner; "he did splendidly in the exam"; "we got along famously" [syn: {magnificently}, {splendidly}]
